content:
You can help create a Material by the §lMaterialBuilder§r.

§lContents:

§lcolor§r: §o§ncolor(int color)§r
Set the Color of this Material. Defaults to 0xFFFFFF unless §ncolorAverage()§r.

§lcolorAverage§r: §o§ncolorAverage(int color)§r
Color will be a weighted average of the components of the Material.

§lFluid§r: §o§nfluid(@Optional String type, @Optional boolean hasBlock)§r
Add a FluidProperty to this Material.
 §l○§r type – The Material.FluidType of this Material, either "fluid" or "gas".
 §l○§r hasBlock – If true, create a Fluid Block for this Material.

§lplasma§r: §o§nplasma()§r 
Add a PlasmaProperty to this Material.
 §l○§r type – The Material.FluidType of this Material, either "fluid" or "gas".
 §l○§r hasBlock – If true, create a Fluid Block for this Material.

§ldust§r: §o§ndust(@Optional int harvestLevel, @Optional int burnTime)§r 
Add a DustProperty to this Material.
 §l○§r harvestLevel – The Harvest Level of this block for Mining. If this Material also has a ToolProperty, this value will also be used to determine the tool's Mining Level.
 §l○§r burnTime – The Burn Time (in ticks) of this Material as a Furnace Fuel.

§lingot§r: §o§ningot(@Optional int harvestLevel, @Optional int burnTime)§r 
Add an IngotProperty to this Material.
 §l○§r harvestLevel – The Harvest Level of this block for Mining. If this Material also has a ToolProperty, this value will also be used to determine the tool's Mining level. If this Material already had a Harvest Level defined, it will be overridden.
 §l○§r burnTime – The Burn Time (in ticks) of this Material as a Furnace Fuel. If this Material already had a Burn Time defined, it will be overridden.

§lgem§r: §o§ngem(@Optional int harvestLevel, @Optional int burnTime)§r 
Add a GemProperty to this Material.
 §l○§r harvestLevel – The Harvest Level of this block for Mining. If this Material also has a ToolProperty, this value will also be used to determine the tool's Mining level. If this Material already had a Harvest Level defined, it will be overridden.
 §l○§r burnTime – The Burn Time (in ticks) of this Material as a Furnace Fuel. If this Material already had a Burn Time defined, it will be overridden.

§ltoolStats§r: §o§ntoolStats(float speed, float damage, int durability, int enchantability)§r 
Set the stat for tools which are made from this Material.
 §l○§r speed – Speed.
 §l○§r damage – Attack damage.
 §l○§r durability – Durability of tools.
 §l○§r enchantability – Enchantability of tools.

§lblastTemp§r: §o§nblastTemp(int temp)§r 
Blast Furnace Temperature of this Material. If below 1000K, Primitive Blast Furnace recipes will be also added. If above 1750K, a Hot Ingot and its Vacuum Freezer recipe will be also added.

If a Material with this Property has a Fluid, its temperature will be set to this if it is the default Fluid temperature.
 §l○§r temp – Temperature.

§lore§r: §o§nore(@Optional int oreMultiplier, @Optional int byproductMultiplier, @Optional boolean emissive)§r 
Add ore blocks of this Material.
 §l○§r oreMultiplier – Crushed Ore output amount multiplier during Maceration. Default: 1 (no multiplier).
 §l○§r byproductMultiplier – Byproducts output amount multiplier during Maceration. Default: 1 (no multiplier).
 §l○§r emissive – Should ore block use the emissive texture. Default: false.

Emissive ore as follow:

§lwashedIn§r: §o§nwashedIn(String materialName, @Optional int washedAmount)§r 

§lwashedIn§r: §o§nwashedIn(Material material, @Optional int washedAmount)§r 
Set washing product of this Material (must has the ore property).
 §l○§r material – material.
 §l○§r washedAmount – amount.

§lseparatedInto§r: §o§nseparatedInto(String... materialNames)§r 

§lseparatedInto§r: §o§nseparatedInto(Material... materials)§r 
Set separated products of this Material (must has the ore property).
 §l○§r materials – separated materials.

§laddOreByproducts§r: §o§naddOreByproducts(String... materialNames)§r 

§laddOreByproducts§r: §o§naddOreByproducts(Material... materials)§r 
Set ore byproducts of this Material (must has the ore property).
 §l○§r materials – separated materials.

§loreSmeltInto§r: §o§noreSmeltInto(String materialName)§r 

§loreSmeltInto§r: §o§noreSmeltInto(Material material)§r 
Set smelt product of this Material (must has the ore property).
 §l○§r material – material.

§lpolarizesInto§r: §o§npolarizesInto(String materialName)§r 

§lpolarizesInto§r: §o§npolarizesInto(Material material)§r 
Set polarizes product of this Material (must has the ore property).
 §l○§r material – material.

§larcSmeltInto§r: §o§narcSmeltInto(String materialName)§r 

§larcSmeltInto§r: §o§narcSmeltInto(Material material)§r 
Set arcSmelt product of this Material (must has the ore property).
 §l○§r material – material.

§lmacerateInto§r: §o§nmacerateInto(String materialName)§r 

§lmacerateInto§r: §o§nmacerateInto(Material material)§r 
Set macerate product of this Material (must has the ore property).
 §l○§r material – material.

§lingotSmeltInto§r: §o§ningotSmeltInto(String materialName)§r 

§lingotSmeltInto§r: §o§ningotSmeltInto(Material material)§r 
Set ingotSmelt product of this Material (must has the ore property).
 §l○§r material – material.

§lfluidTemp§r: §o§nfluidTemp(int temp)§r 
Set the temperature of the fluid of this Material (must has the fluid property).
 §l○§r temp – temperature.

§lcableProperties§r: §o§ncableProperties(long voltage, int amperage, int loss, @Optional boolean isSuperCon)§r 
Add a cables and wires of this Material.
 §l○§r voltage – voltage.
 §l○§r amperage – amperage.
 §l○§r loss – loss.
 §l○§r isSuperCon – isSuperCon.

§lfluidPipeProperties§r: §o§nfluidPipeProperties(int maxTemp, int throughput, boolean gasProof)§r 
Add fluid pipes of this Material.
 §l○§r maxTemp – max acceptable temperature.
 §l○§r throughput – §l//TODO§r.
 §l○§r gasProof – §l//TODO§r.

§litemPipeProperties§r: §o§nitemPipeProperties(int priority, float stacksPerSec)§r 
Add item pipes of this Material.
 §l○§r priority – Items will try to take the path with the lowest priority.
 §l○§r stacksPerSec – rate in stacks per sec.

§laddDefaultEnchant§r: §o§naddDefaultEnchant(IEnchantment enchantment)§r 
Add Default Enchant of this Material.
 §l○§r enchantment – enchantment.

§5

§liconSet§r: §o§niconSet(String iconSet)§r 
Set the MaterialIconSet of this Material. Defaults vary depending on if the Material has a: 
 §l○§r §nGemProperty§r, it will default to §l"GEM_VERTICAL"§r
 §l○§r §nIngotProperty§r or §nDustProperty§r, it will default to §l"DULL"§r
 §l○§r §nFluidProperty§r, it will default to either §l"FLUID"§r or §l"GAS"§r, depending on the FluidType
 §l○§r §nPlasmaProperty§r, it will default to §l"FLUID"§r

Default will be determined by first-found Property in this order, unless specified.

The §lComponent§r refers to compositions of the material. 
For example, the compositions of the §lSugar§r are §n2*Carbon§r, §n5*Water§r, and §n25*Oxygen§r. That would affect its chemical formula:

§lcomponents§r: §o§ncomponents(MaterialStack[] components)§r 
Set the compositions of the material.
 §l○§r components - compositions.

§lflags§r: §o§nflags(String... names)§r 
Add MaterialFlags to this Material.
 §l○§r names - names of specific MaterialFlags.

§lelement§r: §o§nelement(String elementName)§r 
Set the element of this Material.
 §l○§r elementName - names of the element.
